description: This image captures a Galapagos Lava Lizard in the Galapagos Islands, holding a small, white, possibly dead, invertebrate in its mouth. The lizard is perched on a dark, textured volcanic rock formation. The background is blurred, suggesting a natural, outdoor setting.

interactions: Holding a small invertebrate in its mouth
Being held by the Galapagos Lava Lizard
Providing a substrate for the lizard
